alert.note: Alert for Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 1:17PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western White Pine and southeastern Eureka Counties through 145 PM PDT... At 117 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Eureka, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Eureka, Pinto Summit and Eureka Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County
